faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: What services does Event Casino Schweiz offer?
faq.answer1: Event Casino Schweiz provides professional casino equipment rentals for events across Switzerland. Our games include Black Jack, American Roulette, Texas Hold'em Poker, Ultimate Texas Hold'em, Chuck a Luck, and Dice Ball, managed by trained croupiers, led by Davide Merli, Europe’s best croupier in 2012 with over 15 years of experience.
faq.question2: What types of events are suitable for a casino experience?
faq.answer2: Our casino services are perfect for corporate events, team building, weddings, private parties, birthdays, and product launches. We customize each event to create a memorable experience for your guests.
faq.question3: How does a casino event work?
faq.answer3: We bring a full casino setup to your venue, including professional tables, chips, and other equipment. Our experienced croupiers, led by expert Davide Merli, ensure guests enjoy an authentic and engaging experience.
faq.question4: Is real money used in the games?
faq.answer4: No, our casino events are strictly for entertainment, offering a realistic casino experience without real money, so all guests can enjoy safely.
faq.question5: How many tables do I need for my event?
faq.answer5: We recommend one table for every 20 guests to ensure everyone can participate. For larger events, we can discuss custom setups to suit the guest count.
faq.question6: What is the quality of the equipment used?
faq.answer6: We use high-quality, authentic casino tables, chips, and other equipment, offering a realistic and premium gaming experience.
faq.question7: How do I book Event Casino Schweiz for my event?
faq.answer7: Booking is easy. Contact us through our website or give us a call. We will discuss your needs, recommend a custom package, and handle all logistics for a seamless event.
faq.question8: Can I customize the casino setup for my event?
faq.answer8: Absolutely. Every event is unique and can be customized to your exact needs. We collaborate with professionals to create an unforgettable experience for you and your guests.
faq.question9: What is included in a standard casino rental package?
faq.answer9: Each rental package includes your choice of tables, chips, cards, and professional croupiers. We also handle setup and breakdown, ensuring a seamless experience from start to finish.
faq.question10: Do you operate across all of Switzerland?
faq.answer10: Yes, Event Casino Schweiz serves clients throughout Switzerland, bringing high-quality casino entertainment wherever you are.
faq.answer11: Our croupiers are highly trained professionals, led by Davide Merli, Europe’s best croupier in 2012, with over 15 years of experience.
faq.question12: What makes Event Casino Schweiz different from other providers?
faq.answer12: We stand out with our commitment to quality, customization, and client satisfaction. With premium equipment, professional croupiers, and the expertise of Davide Merli, we provide an unmatched experience in Switzerland’s casino entertainment industry.
faq.question13: Can you handle large events with multiple tables and croupiers?
faq.answer13: Yes, we can accommodate events of various sizes. We’ll work with you to determine the best setup and number of tables to ensure an optimal experience for your guests.
faq.question14: How far in advance should I book?
faq.answer14: To secure your preferred date and services, we recommend booking a few weeks in advance. We will also do our best to accommodate last-minute requests.
faq.question15: What are the pricing options for your casino rental services?
faq.answer15: Pricing varies depending on event size, number of tables, and customization options. Contact us for a tailored quote.
faq.answer16: Yes, we offer additional entertainment like live music, magicians, and themed decor to enhance the overall atmosphere.
faq.question17: Are you affiliated with a licensed casino?
faq.answer17: No, Event Casino Schweiz is not affiliated with any licensed casino. We specialize in casino-themed entertainment without gambling activities.
faq.question18: Which areas do you cover for service?
faq.answer18: We provide services throughout Switzerland, from Zurich to Geneva, Basel, Bern, and beyond.

member1.name: Agent Sophia Ferrari
member1.description: Sophia, a strategist with a steady hand, commands the cards like no other. One look at her inscrutable face is enough to make her opponents sweat. Her favorite saying: 'In my game, there's no room for mistakes.'

member2.name: Luca 'The Roulette King' Verdi
member2.description: Luca embodies elegance and precision. His talent at the roulette table is legendary. He knows the laws of chance, yet he always wins. His secret weapon? A smile that lights up the room.

member3.name: Maximilian Schmidt
member3.description: Maximilian appears calm and thoughtful, but beneath the surface lies a formidable opponent. His skills in Texas Hold'em are world-renowned, and he never leaves doubt about his next move.

member4.name: Marco 'The Spy' Rossi
member4.description: With charm, style, and a touch of mystery, Marco draws everyone's attention. His passion for the game is only surpassed by his secret mission: to provide the perfect casino experience.

member5.name: Davide Merli
member5.description: Davide Merli is a living legend in the casino world. Named the best croupier in Europe in 2012, he brings over 15 years of experience to the industry. His skill and presence bring unparalleled authenticity to every event, making him the true elite of casino entertainment.

member6.name: Philip Schlegel
member6.description: Philip Schlegel is a visionary in the world of marketing and founder of House of Marketing and Alpen Design. With his knowledge and experience, he ensures the success and growth of Event Casino Schweiz, crafting exciting and customized experiences for every event.

member7.name: Dawid Glapiak
member7.role: Service Excellence Expert and Event Coordinator
member7.description: Dawid Glapiak is an internationally experienced croupier trained at the prestigious JCA Academy. With experience at Genting Casinos UK, Swiss Casinos, and Casino Davos AG, he is our expert in service excellence, leading events with unmatched dedication and professionalism.

training.heading: Croupier Academy
training.mainTitle: Become the Master of the Gaming Tables
training.introText: Our Croupier Academy offers you the opportunity to acquire practical and theoretical skills to work in the most renowned casinos in Switzerland and Liechtenstein. With a flexible program and experienced instructors, you will be well-prepared to lead the most sought-after tables.

roulette.title: Roulette
roulette.description: Learn to manage one of the most iconic casino games. In our Academy, you'll acquire the skills to professionally spin the roulette wheel, manage bets, and interact confidently with players.

blackjack.title: Blackjack
blackjack.description: Discover all the secrets of blackjack, one of the most popular casino games. You'll be trained to manage bets, communicate with players, and maintain control of the table to ensure a flawless gaming experience.

poker.title: Poker
poker.description: Become a poker expert by leading tables for Texas Hold'em, Omaha, and other variants. You'll learn the rules, betting dynamics, and how to provide professional service in every hand.

serviceExcellence.title: Service Excellence
serviceExcellence.description: A croupier is not just a game manager but also an ambassador of customer service. Our Academy  teaches you to guarantee an excellent experience for every guest, from the welcome at the table to the last game.

point1.title: Comprehensive Training
point1.description: Acquire all the technical and practical skills you need to work in the most renowned casinos in Switzerland and Liechtenstein.

point2.title: Course Flexibility
point2.description: The Academy lasts 1 to 3 months with the option to attend classes twice a week to fit your commitments.

point3.title: Practical and Theoretical Learning
point3.description: Learn to manage blackjack, roulette, and poker tables with technical and mathematical skills that you can also deepen from home.

point4.title: Direct Connections to Casinos
point4.description: Benefit from our direct connections to the major casinos in Switzerland and Liechtenstein to start working immediately.

point5.title: Exclusive Learning Environment
point5.description: Join a small group of students for personalized support and a tailored learning experience.

point6.title: Experienced Instructors
point6.description: Learn from the best professionals in the industry with years of experience in the gambling world and table management.

point7.title: Career Opportunities
point7.description: After completing the Academy, you'll be ready to start your career as a croupier, with job opportunities in the best event casinos.

point8.title: Continuous Support
point8.description: We offer ongoing support even after the Academy ends to help you enter the job market and develop your career.

training.requirementsIntro: To participate in our Croupier Academy, the following requirements must be met:

requirementsList.item3: No entries in the debt register

training.callToActionTitle: Ready to Start Your Career as a Croupier?
training.callToActionText: Contact us today for more information about our Croupier Academy and learn how we can help you enter the exclusive world of casinos. Places are limited!

casino101.heading: Casino101: Learn the Art of Casino Games
casino101.subheading: Not Just Casino Parties, But Also Training for a Complete Gaming Experience
casino101.description: In addition to exciting casino events, we offer introductory courses suitable for anyone looking to have fun with friends or at corporate events. Even if you've never been to a casino, you can quickly learn the rules and strategies of the most popular games and play safely and with pleasure.

roulette.title: “Place Your Bets!” The Pleasure at the Roulette Table
roulette.description: Discover the fascinating world of roulette, one of the oldest and most exciting casino games. Learn how to place bets, spin the wheel, and take advantage of the best odds to fully experience the thrill of the game.

blackjack.title: “Hit 21!” Excitement at the Blackjack Table
blackjack.description: Blackjack is one of the most popular casino games worldwide. In this training, you'll learn the basics of the game, strategies to beat the house, and how to act successfully at the table as a dealer or player.

texas_holdem.title: Grab the “Pot!” A Guide for Thrills at the Poker Table
texas_holdem.description: Texas Hold'em is the most well-known poker variant. Our training guides you through the rules, betting strategies, and the psychology behind the game so you're well-prepared when you sit at the table.

ultimate_texas.title: Team Building or Just Fun with Friends
ultimate_texas.description: Ultimate Texas Hold'em is an exciting variant of poker. In this course, you'll learn how to make smart bets, read the cards, and recognize the best hands to play against the house.

three_card_poker.title: For Those Who Prefer to Learn Quietly
three_card_poker.description: One of the simpler poker variants that still offers a lot of excitement. 3 Card Poker is especially popular in British casinos and on cruise ships. Learn basic strategies and hand combinations.

group_events.title: Group Events: Learning Together
group_events.description: Team building or just fun with friends—our group trainings are perfect for discovering the secrets of casino games together. Our experienced croupiers show you and your group the best tricks and tips.

individual_events.title: Individual Training: Learn Alone
individual_events.description: For those who prefer to learn quietly, we offer individual casino game trainings. You can focus on your preferred game and learn at your own pace.

cta_croupier.title: Ready to Start Your Career as a Croupier?
cta_croupier.description: Contact us today for more information about our training course and learn how we can help you enter the exclusive world of casinos. Places are limited!

cta_team.title: The Casino Elite: Our Game Masters at Your Service
cta_team.description: Whether at the poker table or the fast-paced roulette, our professional croupiers bring class and excitement to every game. With decades of experience in the casino world, we guarantee you an evening full of thrill and style. Experience the perfection of an exclusive night where every detail counts.

section1.title: Introduction
section1.content: This Privacy Policy explains how Event Casino Switzerland collects, uses, and protects your personal data. We are committed to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring that your personal data is securely stored and used only for the specified purposes.

section2.title: Data Collected
section2.content: We collect the following personal data when you use our website or fill out the contact form: Name, email address, message, and other information you voluntarily provide. This data is used only in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

section3.title: Use of Data
section3.content: The collected data is used to respond to your inquiries, provide information about our services, manage reservations, and facilitate communication regarding your events. We also use the data to improve the user-friendliness of our website.

section4.title: Data Storage
section4.content: Your data is stored only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected or as required by law. After these periods, your data will be securely deleted or anonymized.

section5.title: Data Sharing
section5.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties unless it is necessary to provide our services or required by law. In such cases, we ensure that appropriate measures are taken to protect your data.

section6.title: Your Rights
section6.content: You have the right to access your data and to correct, delete, or restrict its processing. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at hello@eventcasino.ch. We will handle your request in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

section7.title: Data Security
section7.content: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of your personal data and to protect it from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. However, we cannot guarantee absolute security, as data transmission over the internet carries inherent risks.

section8.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
section8.content: We reserve the right to change this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be published on this page. We recommend that you regularly review this page to ensure that you are familiar with the current policies.

section9.title: Contact Information
section9.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, you can contact us at hello@eventcasino.ch.

section1.title: Introduction
section1.content: Welcome to Event Casino Switzerland! These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website, accessible at https://eventcasinoschweiz.ch. By accessing our website or using our services, you agree to these terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website.

section2.title: User Responsibilities
section2.content: As a user of our website, you agree to use Event Casino Switzerland responsibly. You commit not to use the website for unlawful, illegal, fraudulent, or harmful purposes, or in any way that could impair the availability or accessibility of the website.

section3.title: Copyrights
section3.content: Unless otherwise stated, Event Casino Switzerland and its licensors own the copyrights to all content on the website. You may use these materials only for personal use, without republishing, selling, renting, or sublicensing them.

section4.title: Limitation of Liability
section4.content: Event Casino Switzerland is not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, nor for loss of profits, revenue, data, or other intangible losses arising from your use of our website or services.

section5.title: Governing Law
section5.content: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of Switzerland. Any disputes arising from or relating to these terms are subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Switzerland.

section6.title: Cookies Policy
section6.content: Event Casino Switzerland uses cookies to enhance the user experience and provide personalized services. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our Cookies Policy.

section7.title: Changes to the Terms and Conditions
section7.content: Event Casino Switzerland reserves the right to change these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be published on this page, and it is recommended to review this page regularly to stay informed.

section8.title: Contact Information
section8.content: For further information or questions about these Terms and Conditions, you can contact us at hello@eventcasino.ch.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.description: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
